post.desc:
Firstly, "Shōryōgyūba" is basically "Spirit Cow" and "Spirit Horse". These are the cucumber horse and the eggplant cow figures used as decorations for [**Obon**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Obon). The cucumber horse is supposed to be green, lean and tall; while the eggplant cow is supposed to be purple, fat and short. ***In the manga***, Jōsuke wears a green undershirt, and his hair is – \**coughs* – big and purple.

Secondly, an obligatory pointing-out that another way of reading Jōsuke's surname is **Touhou**. Yes, "Higashikata" uses those same characters (東方). And yes, that makes him...

# Touhou JoJo
